content: this is an adult-sized version of my baby sized celtic knot work hat 1 i can t take credit for this pattern either raveler justmichelle 2 expanded the smaller chart so that it would be tall enough to cover an adult sized head i simply plugged it in to a standard hat pattern 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/celtic-knot-work-hat 2 http //www ravelry com/people/justmichelle
